\section{Class reliafree.capacitors.fixed.Glass}

    \label{reliafree:capacitors:fixed:Glass}
\begin{tabular}{cccccc}
% Line for reliafree.capacitors.capacitor.Capacitor, linespec=[False]
\multicolumn{2}{r}{\settowidth{\BCL}{reliafree.capacitors.capacitor.Capacitor}\multirow{2}{\BCL}{reliafree.capacitors.capacitor.Capacitor}}
&&
  \\\cline{3-3}
  &&\multicolumn{1}{c|}{}
&&
  \\
&&\multicolumn{2}{l}{\textbf{reliafree.capacitors.fixed.Glass}}
\end{tabular}

Fixed Glass Capacitor Component Class. Covers specifications MIL-C-11272 
and MIL-C-23269.

Hazard Rate Models:

\begin{enumerate}

\setlength{\parskip}{0.5ex}
  \item MIL-HDBK-217F, section 10.9

\end{enumerate}
